cont.entity_a: Item packaging appeared old and dirty.
cont.entity_b: Genuine Dewalt product in factory packing.

cont.entity_a: Batteries are compatible with DeWalt DW996 power driver.
cont.entity_b: Third set of batteries for DeWalt 7.2 cordless screwdriver.

cont.entity_a: Battery life is not long-lasting under heavy use. Battery life is good but requires charger on every job. Battery gives longer run time and better torque.
cont.entity_b: First set lasted about 6 years, second set 4 years. Batteries last weeks before needing recharge. Battery life is very good, lasting for an hour or two of steady use.

cont.entity_a: Batteries are well made and give good service.
cont.entity_b: Batteries hold up well in demanding environments.

cont.entity_a: OEM battery performs like new and fits well. Battery pack works great and holds charge well. Battery fit perfectly and fully charges. New battery provides great power and retains charge.
cont.entity_b: Replacement batteries work well for heavy use. Replacement battery keeps tools going all day. Replacement battery works great in electric screwdriver.

cont.entity_a: Pricey compared to other brands but lasts longer. Great price compared to local stores. Price and performance better than local store options.
cont.entity_b: Genuine OEM Dewalt 7.2V batteries at a reasonable price.

cont.entity_a: Better build quality than aftermarket batteries.
OEM battery has longer run time than original. OEM batteries are more reliable than rebuilt or knock-offs.
cont.entity_b: OEM batteries last more than twice as long as Powerextra. OEM batteries hold charge better than aftermarket.

cont.entity_a: Batteries are slightly larger but fit existing tools. Fits the equipment as designed and charges fine.
cont.entity_b: Battery fits snugly but works fine.

cont.entity_a: Battery charged and held charge well over six months.
cont.entity_b: Replacement batteries do not last long after full charge.
